Blog.post: You know, at my old school, I had been called a headbanging devilworshiping kracka everyday... even though I don't headbang, or worship the devil (HEiL SATAN! O__O) but at my new school, thats what everyone is (without the devilworshipping... stupid christian foos...), but everyone now calls me a poser for not headbanging everytime Smells Like Teen Spirit comes on the radio... I was never aware Nirvana headbanged at all... I was never aware heroin users could haedbang either... Anyways, for the first day of school this year, I'm gonna be as Gangsta as I can be, even though I know I'd be a wanksta... yeah, its sad... Either that or I'm gonan become a conformist hating mall goth... w/e...

"I'm Gonna kill myself... Just me and NO ONE ELSE, I'm gonna kill myself... Cryin the night away, I'm gonna kill myself... Just me and NO ONE ELSE, I'm gonna kill myself... Cuz' I'm an Emo kiiiiddd... (here comes in my guitar solo I'm workin on... I'll post some tabs for the song after I'm done with the solo) I'm gonna jump off that cliff, I'm gonna take those pills! I'm gonna tie that noose- ITS JUST NO USE I'm gonna pull the trigger, Leave that note behind, Cuz I'm an EMO-O-O-O-O-O-O, KID *whisper* emo Kid... x5" Yeah... its my master piece... Share it with your friends, have your band steal it and play it at your shows...Just send me money throught pay pal when you do =)

The other day, I was in a yahoo! chat (I was banned from my usual IRC channel) a ran into a person, Bionic_Roboto (everyone who reads this, please DL Acid Bomb at http://www.yahoo-elite.tk/ and Buzz Bomb the shit out of her =D) and she responded to me after I said "owned" and said I was an idiot. She started getting all defensive, saying I am an inferior being, because she was smart... She graduated from High school... So special... Anyways, I know I'm an idiot, and I told her that many times... She started sayin all this philisofical (sp?) crap, about how the only point to living was to be smart... I started asking her if she had any friends, and she said, "yeah, I have many friends." It was a saturday... The fuckin chode... She said I had a chance to suceed, and some other motivational (so she says) BS, and then I told her I grew up in the Ghetto, not some rich people place in erm... virginia... (Theres rich people there, right?) And she said I was the one putting up a front... Then I got that Yahell dude to boot her, but she was using Mychat!... the fucking chode... So we just buzz bombed her till she couldn't take it anymore... Moral of the story? If you're smart, don't be a chode...

hi. My name is stevimundo, but call me Soma... Please, for heavens sake... I am your average teenage boy scum emo dude who is confused about his life. No, that is NOT what I tell people when I first meat them... Anyways, yeah, schools starting, and it blows! I have a few friends I met at the end of the year, but other than that, I'm gonna get killed... No one really knows who I am... I'm some dude who got his brain fucked up (ask me, and I'll tell ya...) and now neither knows how to interact with people, or remember to do homework... I ended up in Summer school this year for failing English... And Science... and probly health, never learned bout that one... I'm teachin myself to play the guitar, and wrote a song mocking those depressing acoustic song, and I call it emo song... it would be that song on the alblum you'd wanna skip, but its kinda catchy... I'll make a post bout it later... Anyways, I take paypal... =)
